title: Simple Essay Rubric

levels.name: Excellent
levels.description: Ideas are clearly and logically presented with strong organization.

levels.name: Good
levels.description: Ideas are mostly clear with minor organizational issues.

levels.name: Fair
levels.description: Some ideas are unclear or poorly organized.

levels.name: Poor
levels.description: Ideas are confusing and hard to follow.

levels.name: Excellent
levels.description: Strong evidence that clearly supports the argument.

levels.name: Good
levels.description: Good evidence with some support for the argument.

levels.name: Fair
levels.description: Some evidence but weak support for the argument.

levels.name: Poor
levels.description: Little to no evidence or irrelevant evidence.

scaleNote: Simple 3-criteria rubric for quick testing. Total possible points: 12.
